official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that August 30, 1990, be observed as "1890 Land-Grant Institutions Centennial Recognition Day".

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that August 30, 1990, should be designated as 1890 Land-Grant Institutions Centennial Recognition Day.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that August 30, 1990, be observed as "1890 Land-Grant Institutions Centennial Recognition Day".
